plot: During music class before the chorus festival, male student Hikaru Kusakabe notices that the bespectacled honor student Rihito Sajo is not singing. Although he thinks that Rihito just doesn't like singing, he finds him practicing alone in the classroom after school. Without even thinking, Hikaru calls out to him.
ending_theme: "Dōkyūsei" (同級生; Classmates) by Kōtarō Oshio with Yuki Ozaki from Galileo Galilei
